Name: Psyche Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Dark-type moves from damaging Psychic-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Psychic-type Pokémon.  You can get a Psyche Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Gold Silk, a Psyche Dust, and a Psyche Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
